document.full_text: three people were killed after syrian troops and gunmen entered the town of tel kelakh on saturday, a rights campaigner said, and hundreds fled what they said was fierce fighting into neighboring lebanon.
document.title: three killed in syrian town and hundreds flee to lebanon
lines_and_colors: three people were killed after syrian troops and gunmen entered the town of tel kelakh on saturday, a rights campaigner said, and hundreds fled what they said was fierce fighting into neighboring lebanon.
